text: Gran Turismo is the PlayStation Portable game of the Gran Turismo racing series. It has over 700 cars. The fastest cars are the Bugatti Veyron, and the two Formula One cars.[Source?] ==References== Category:2009 video games Category:Gran Turismo series Category:PlayStation Portable games Category:PlayStation Portable-only games Category:Racing simulators Category:Racing video games Category:Sony Interactive Entertainment games Category:Video games developed in Japan Category:Video games set in France Category:Video games set in Italy
title: Gran Turismo (PlayStation Portable)
